Name: Tatanka Royale
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: Champagne with a subtle, grassy hint of apple.
History: Discovered in 2004 at Indigo Yard, Edinburgh, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of Tatanka Royale contains 82 calories
